name: GDKO Trivia
description:
A game made for GDKO Round 3.

You will be asked a series of questions about the Game Dev Knock Out jam, answer as many as you can before time runs out! There are two different quizzes that you can try.

I originally had a completely different idea but ended up doing this instead. This is the first time I have used Twine so it’s not perfect but hopefully it will be good enough.

All games referenced are from the GDKO jam.
